seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for booking locally with ezToff, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

|--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
demand qty:X due-date:X tags:X

demand demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate} locale:{demand>location>postalCode} {demand>location>countryCode} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
propose proposal:{proposal>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following tee-off demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} pullCart:{demand>metadata>pullCart} golfCart:{demand>metadata>golfCart} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:X unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:X metadata:{demand>metadata} round-price:X total-cost:X tee-time:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand update ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} dueDate:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following tee-off demand update ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} pullCart:{demand>metadata>pullCart} golfCart:{demand>metadata>golfCart} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for demand:{demand>key} | The store:{store>key} {store>name} will be asked to mark and hold demand:{demand>key}.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for tee-off Demand:{demand>key} | The golf course {store>name} will be asked to reserve the tee-off time {demand>dueDate}.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} for Demand:{demand>key} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with Demand:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} on {proposal>dueDate} has been confirmed.| Please mark, schedule the tee-off Demand:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, Thanks for closing demand:{demand>key} - which will be reflected in your AnotherSocialEconomy.com Rating shortly.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
The Demand# {demand>key} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using AnotherSocialEconomy.com, please recommend us to your friends. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
The ezToff Demand# {demand>key} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using ezToff, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

FYI. demand:{demand>key} associated to proposal:{proposal>key} has been closed by the Consumer. | Hint: Send "close proposal:{proposal>key}", or, "flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your AnotherSocialEconomy.com Rating.
:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, Thanks for closing proposal:{proposal>key} - which will be reflected in your AnotherSocialEconomy.com Rating shortly.

Hi {proposal>owner>name},
The Proposal# {proposal>key} has been closed.
Your score is going to be updated accordingly. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

Hi {proposal>owner>name},
The reservation under the ezToff Proposal# {proposal>key} has been closed.
Your score is going to be updated accordingly. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

FYI. proposal:{proposal>key} for your demand:{demand>key} has been closed by the store:{store>key} {store>name}. | Hint: Send "close demand:{demand>key}", or, "flag demand:{demand>key} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your AnotherSocialEconomy.com Rating.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has closed their Proposal# {proposal>key}. Please close your corresponding Demand {demand>key} to better your Rating.
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has closed their ezToff Proposal# {proposal>key}. Please close your corresponding tee-off Demand {demand>key} to better your Rating.
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, your demand:{demand>key} has been successfully canceled.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
Your Demand# {demand>key} has been canceled.
If you enjoyed using AnotherSocialEconomy.com, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}.
:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, owner of demand:{demand>key} canceled it.| Your confirmed proposal:{proposal>key} has been canceled as a side effect without impacting your rating.
:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, your proposal:{proposal>key} has been successfully canceled.

:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, the proposal:{proposal>key} you confirmed has been canceled.| Your demand:{demand>key} has been re-broadcasted to stores around. Send "cancel demand:{demand>key}" to stop the process.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has canceled their Proposal# {proposal>key}. As the result, your Demand# {demand>key} has been forwarded to stores in your area.
If for any reason, you're no longer interested in this demand, you can send an email by clicking cancel, or, if you've received this message in error, click There's been some kind of mistake :-(
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.
